EmailTemplate.subject: ONE MONTH Until Final Payment Deadline
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Mexico Volunteers!
This is a reminder about the following items:
Payment Deadline:
There are four weeks left to fundraise for your trip. Remember to share your Canada Helps page and finish off all of your fundraising plans.
$300 deposit should already be on your page to secure your spot.
$1,395 is due June 1st, 2014
Booking your flights:
When booking flights, please book them to San Diego, CA.
Airport: San Diego, CA - Airport Code: SAN
Once you have booked your flights, please forward me the flight itinerary that your airlines sent you.
Travel Health Insurance:
Please provide me with the following:
Insurance Provider
Policy #
Phone number
Thanks to those who have already sent in the above information!
Do you know anyone who is thinking of joining you in Mexico this summer? We still have spots left!
Please have them contact me soon. The more the merrier!
Live Different Store
We're very excited to introduce to you our Live Different store! http://store.livedifferent.com
What's the best part about purchasing a t-shirt? The proceeds of Live Different's merchandise sales go directly towards our charitable projects.
Have a great weekend!
Jenn Digiandomenico
Program Administrator
